department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: The Canadian Coast Guard has a requirement for the small vessel disposal services of the CCG North Rock located in Prince Rupert, British Columbia by October 15, 2023.
description: The proposed disposal services will commence on November 16, 2023. The Crown is storing harmful substances in the vessels and seeks proposals that can provide a safe and environmentally Responsible method of disposal, along with ensuring the maintenance and preservation of the historical significance of the vessels.
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
Title: F7044-230295: Small Vessel Disposal Service for CCG North Rock
Description
The Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) is seeking proposals for the disposal of small vessels at its North Rock facility located in Prince Rupert, British Columbia. The deadline for submission is August 31, 2023, at 14:00 (local time).

## Tender Details

* Solicitation Number: WS4113133186
* Reference Number: WS4113133186-Doc4131322494
* Tender Closing Date: August 31, 2023, 14:00 local time
* Expected Contract Start Date: November 16, 2023
* Tender Status: Expiré (Expired)

## Procurement Method

This procurement is being sourced under a Request for Proposal (RFP) process. The selection criteria will be based on the lowest price.

## Trade Agreements

This tender is governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and is subject to the rules and regulations set forth in the agreement.

## Contact Information

For any inquiries or clarification regarding the tender, please contact:

* Tracy Birtwistle, Public Service Commission (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [tracy.birtwistle@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tracy.birtwistle@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Notice URL

The official tender notice can be accessed at the following URL:
[http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17077884?extsite=MTcwNzc4ODRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17077884?extsite=MTcwNzc4ODRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

The rewritten entry has been condensed and rephrased to reflect the requirements of the CCG North Rock facility. The key details of the tender, including the deadline for submission, tender status, procurement method, trade agreements, and contact information, have been highlighted. The notice URL has also been provided for reference. Please review the original document for all other details and ensure compliance with the tender requirements.  Document preservation is at your discretion. 

Thank you for the prompt collaboration! If you need any correction before completing the task, please let me know.
